PROJECT MINIMAL

Why I started this weekly blog

Posted by on March 10, 2020 · 1 min read

Starting 2020 off with a bang üéâ, even though I‚Äôm late to the game for 3 months but whatever. The purpose of this weekly blog is simple, I want to share my tips and tricks on programming and some day to day experiences.

As this is the first time I tried blogging, it is still in experimenting phrase, which means this website will change often times.

WHY

As Melanie Hsieh once said:

Every project must start with a Why.

(I‚Äôm pretty sure someone famous said that, but since this is my blog I can say whatever I want. üòÇ)

My WHY is to inspire other girls to pursue engineering or tech, pursue might not be the word but introduce them to The World of Technology. The number of Women in Tech üë©‚ÄçüíªÔ∏è is still low, and the future world defenitely need more engineers. So why not combine the two together?

And this is why Project Minimal is created. (I don‚Äôt even know how I came up with this name but someday sometime this name just poped up in my brain so I‚Äôm sticking with my gut.)

This is a minimal website which I decided to create to document my experiences in tech (coding/programming) and share my thoughts and feelings.

Establishing the #projectminimal community, the main purpose is to inspire others to get into technology.

END

This blog gave you some insight on my weekly blog. If you have any further question you can always Email me or find me on Github or Twitter.
